name: Eventide 2: The Sorcerers Mirror
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0b Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0b Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Completed the game in 2Â½ hours - it is a decent game but way too short and simple which is the main reason for my negative review.
